rules_text:
Mill three cards, then you may return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
{2}, Exile Vision of Hope's Tomorrow, a white card, a blue card, a black card and a red card from your graveyard: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named The Antinomy Project and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
